content: Very interesting. I don’t think you’re wrong, but I don’t think we can pass anything like you’re describing with the current make-up of congress. And if a ton of people suddenly lose coverage? I think that would be enough to significantly shake up who is running our government. And hey, maybe a deregulated form of healthcare will actually work, in which case, problem solved. If not? We can elect a congress that will give Americans a single-payer system.
